Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: That smells nice...
Speaker.line2: The tea seems to be ready to me.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: I really enjoy your company, dear waiter.
Speaker.line2: Such a pleasant afternoon tea time.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Considering you've given me such an extraordinary service...

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: Is there any question left you wish to ask?

Choices.Choice1: Ask why the gathering was held at Eastside

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Could you tell me more about your former husband?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Surprise
Speaker.line1: Oh, would you like to know?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well. he was indeed a devoted husband, committed to the core.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: Such a shame we didn't share the same belief.
Speaker.line2: I can't even remember the number of times I tried to persuade him.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: Unfortunately, he passed away before he was convinced.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I'm actually curious, ma'am.
Speaker.line2: Why the gathering was also held at Eastside?

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: Oh, good question.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Disappoint
Speaker.line1: We want to rescue the poor lambs from such a sinister town.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: And...

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: We also came to celebrate our small 'success'.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I would like to know more about your hometown, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: About that?
Speaker.line2: Oh, dear. I was born and raise in Eastside.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: But after tying the knot, I relocated to the West to my beloved husband.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Where I found not only my belief,
Speaker.line2: But also my truest sense of fulfillment.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: You must surely be tired already.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Thank you, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line1: You're welcome.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: I hope you will consider joining us,
